sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart type="pie" height="300" :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"PieChart",
  props:['data'],
  data() {
    const categories = Array.from({ length: 12 }, (v, i) => `Tháng ${i + 1}`);
      const revenueByMonth = new Array(12).fill(0);
      this.data.map(item => {
      if (item._id && item.totalRevenue) {
        revenueByMonth[item._id - 1] = item.totalRevenue /1000000;
      }
    });
    return{
        series: revenueByMonth,
          chartOptions: {
            chart: {
              width: 380,
              type: 'pie',
              toolbar: {
                show: true,
                offsetX: 0,
                offsetY: 0,
                tools: {
                  download: true,
                  selection: true,
                  zoom: true,
                  zoomin: true,
                  zoomout: true,
                  pan: true,
                  reset: true ,
                  customIcons: []
                },
               
                autoSelected: 'zoom'
              }
            },
            labels: categories,
            responsive: [{
              breakpoint: 480,
              options: {
                chart: {
                  width: 200
                },
                legend: {
                  position: 'bottom'
                }
              }
            }]
          },
    }
         
  }
  }
</script>
